title: Drawing, "Sketchbook Page: Studies after Paintings by Gulio Romano and Raphael; Verso: Anatomical Study", 1811–14
medium: Pen and brown ink, brush and sepia wash over traces of graphite on cream laid paper
inscribed: Inscribed on recto: Giulio Romano Bologna; Raffaello Roma; monumento del quattrocento Bologna; Tempio d iside in Bologna; monumento  de trecento Bologna; monumento de cinquecento Bologna. Inscribed on verso: monumento quattrocento Forli.
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors
description: Sketch from Raphael's Punishment of Elisha; battle scene; interior of church of tomb, Santo Sefano, Bologna; Inscribed: Giulio Romano Bologna. Verso: two anatomical sketches of male body, showing lower portion of thighs, viewed from behind; male head.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Sketchbook Page: Studies after Paintings by Gulio Romano and Raphael; Verso: Anatomical Study", 1811–14.
1811–14. Pen and brown ink, brush and sepia wash over traces of graphite on cream laid paper. Museum purchase through gift of various donors. 1901-39-2435.
